description: Bill and Dennis Get Cozy ... Bill is back in this scene alongside his Marine buddy, Dennis. They are so hot together don't you think? Mike says Dennis is the quiet but once the nervousness wears off he's all action and ready to party. I particularly like Dennis's look as he has that mean, rough and tough look that we imagine our Marines to have. He's also packing a nice piece of meat that he enjoys stroking with Bill. The two of them aren't too proud to play with each other as they do so in this scene after the ice is broken. Dennis and Bill are really into each other and as this scene progresses they reach out and touch and stroke one another and finally shoot huge loads together. Oh this takes me back to the early days!
title: Bill & Dennis
